scenario_text.value: Takuma... Thank you for your help.

You’re welcome. I couldn’t keep my mouth shut
hearing all those bogus things about you.

Talking about how you can’t do anything. That
couldn’t be further from the truth.

You cook delicious food, treat our wounds,
and always treat everyone with kindness.

Seeing someone talk crap about you after all
you do just got on my nerves.

Thank you for disagreeing with all the things
that Labramon said.
